Header: Udawalawa National Park earns the highest daily income
Content: The Udawalawa National Wildlife Park has become the Wildlife Park which earned the highest daily income with the increased arrival of tourists.It was a common sight to see a large number of tourist vehicles coming daily at the Udawalawa National Wildlife Park. The income at the park on the 2nd of this month has increased more than 6.8 million rupees. Officials of the park said that the steps taken by the government to develop the park has contributed to attract more tourists to the Wildlife Park.
